data.text: Ako Kaisariya tsakukala ne imunu yumwe taghwa lyake Korineli, chilongotsi wa chikosi chimwe cha asikali kumi ichikemighwe “Chikosi cha Italiya.”
Yeye ne iwanu wa ukaye yake tsawang'ali wompfuka Imulungu. Tsaang'ali yowapfila wahingwa na komlomba Imulungu matsuwa ghose.
Litsuwa limwe saa tisa nemisi kona ghamaono mwatsimwatsi, malaika we Imulungu kamtsila, kalonga, “Korineli!”
Korineli kamtsodolela tsinenge kwa kupfuka, kaghutsa, “Kuna choni Imtwatsa?”
Sambi watume iwanu ako Yopa wakamkeme imunu iyokemighwa Simoni, taghwa lyake lingi Petiri.
Kokala mne ing'anda ya Simoni mtenda tsingotsi, ing'anda yake yahabehi ne ibahali.”
Malaika yula iyalongile naye hayokile, Korineli kawakema iwatumwa wake weli hamwe na asikali wake yumwe iyompfuka Imulungu.
Kawalongela ghose ighalawile, kuya kawatuma Yopa.
Litsuwa liwinzile, saa sita nemisi iwanu wala hawang'ali wamne ghumwanza, habehi na kupfika Yopa, Petiri kadina mchiswili ili yalombe.
Inzala imtama, kabama ichijo yaje, na ichijo haching'ali chikwambikighwa, kona ghamaono.
Kona kulanga kughubulighwa ne ichinu ka gholole kulu lyohulumsighwa muisi kwa membe tsake nne.
Mghati mwake mna wanyama wose iwali na ghamaghulu mane, na iwotambala hasi na wapfideghe wa kulanga.
Kuya kahulika litsi lyomlongela, “Petiri, winuke uchinje uje!”
Petiri kalonga, “Mbe, Imtwatsa, sina ndiye bae chinu chochose ichighomighwe au ichihile.”
Litsi limlongela keli, “Uleke kupfikema pfiha ipfinu ipfideghetighwe ne Imulungu.”
Imbuli ayo ilawila mala ndatu, kuya gholole liyutsighwa kulanga.
Petiri hayang'ali yokangawala ghamaono ghala gholonga choni, iwanu wala iwatumighwe na Korineli wapfika kune ing'anda ya Simoni, wema mlibani.
Wakemelela, waghutsa ka Simoni yokemighwa Petiri kokala hamo.
Simoni Petiri hayang'ali yokangawala ghamaono agho, baho Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kamlongela, “Simoni, hano hana iwanu wadatu wokubama ghweghwe.
Apfo winuke uhulumke ughende nawo, uleke kupfuka, kwaapfila yaniwatumile nene.”
Petiri kahulumka hasi, kawalongela iwanu awo, “Nene iyo yamumbama. Mtsilile choni hano?”

Wamwidika, “Twolawa kwa Korineli, imkulu we asikali, imunu yanoghile, mpfuka Imulungu na youlikitsighwa na Wayahudi wose. Malaika mwenzeluka kamlongela yakukeme ghweghwe ukaye yake ili yahulike chochose chautsomlongela.”
Kuya Petiri kawalongela iwanu awo wengile mng'anda, wawe wahenza wake.
Litsuwa liwinzile Petiri kapfika Kaisariya. Korineli tsaang'ali yowabeta hamwe na iwandughu tsake na sale tsake iyawakemile.
Petiri hayang'ali yakwingila mng'anda, Korineli kaghenda kumbokela, kamtowela ghamaghoti, kenama mbaka hasi ghendo.
Lekeni Petiri kamwinula, kalonga, “Winuke, nene imwenyegho na imunu ka ghweghwe.”
Na hang'ali yolonga naye, Petiri kengila mng'anda, kawapfika iwanu wengi wetingana.

Kawalongela, “Mwemwe mwomanya ka Myahudi kaghomighwa na malaghitso ghe dini yake kukala ne imunu wa isi ingi, au kumwangila. Lekeni Imulungu kanilangusa ndeke kumwona imunu wowose ng'adeghete au keha.
Apfo hamnikemile, silemile bae kutsa. Lelo nowaghutsa, mnikemile choni?”
Korineli kedika, “Matsuwa madatu ghabitile saa ka ino, tsanikala mng'anda mwangu nolomba. Bahala imunu yane maghwanda matselu ng'ani tsakema hambele hangu,
kalonga, ‘Korineli, Imulungu kabokela malombi ghako na ng'aghasemwile aghala ghauweng'ile iwahingwa.
Lelo, watume iwanu waghende Yopa kumkema Simoni yokemighwa Petiri, kokala mne ing'anda ya Simoni mtenda tsingotsi, iyokala habehi ne ibahali.’
Apfo bahala niwatuma iwanu kuna ghweghwe, naghwe kutenda ghoya ukutsa. Sambi twetwe twa hambele he Imulungu, kuhulikitsa chochose Imulungu chayakulaghitse kutulongela.”
Kuya Petiri kandusa ukulonga, “Lelo nomanya ka Imulungu ng'obaghula bae,
ila kowatoghola iwanu iwompfuka na kutenda ghanoghile kulawa chila isi.
Mwemwe mwomanya imbuli yaitumile Imulungu kuna iwanu wa Isiraeli, kalonga imbuli inoghile iitenda iwanu wakale tseghamba kubitila Yesu Kiristu, Imtwatsa wa wose.
Mwemwe mwomanya ichilawile mne isi yose ya Yudeya, kwandusila Galilaya haumalile ubatitso yaupetile Yohane,

Imulungu pfayamsaghule Yesu wa Natsareti kwa kumwing'a Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ne ingupfu, na pfayaghendile chila hanu aku kotenda ghanoghile na kuhonetsa iwanu wose iwonelighwe na Setani, kwaapfila Imulungu tsakakala naye.
Twetwe twa iwakalangama we ipfinu pfose pfatendile mne isi ya Wayahudi na Yerusalemu. Tsawamkoma kwa kumuwamba mna msalaba.
Lekeni Imulungu kamtsilihula mne litsuwa lya kadatu, kuya kamtenda yoneke ne iwanu.
Ng'oneke ne iwanu wose, ila na iwakalangama iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu, twetwe iyatujile na ukunwa naye hayatsilihuke.
Katulaghitsa tuwapetele iwanu na kuwalongela ka Yesu iyo iyasaghulighwe ne Imulungu yawe imlamutsi we iwaghima na iwafile.
Wanabii wose we Imulungu tsawalonga mbuli tsake ka chila imunu iyomtoghola katsoleghusighwa nzambi tsake kwa taghwa lyake.”
Petiri hayang'ali yolonga mbuli atso, Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kawahulumkila wose iwang'ali wotegheletsa mbuli atso.
Awala Wayahudi iwatoghole iwatsile na Petiri wakangawala kwaapfila nzawadi ya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka pfipfila ighumighwa kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae.
Kwaapfila wawahulika wolonga kwa lugha ingi, na kumtunya Imulungu. Kuya Petiri kalonga,
“Iwanu wano wambokela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ka twetwe pfatumbokele. Angu nani lelo iyodaha kuwaghoma iwanu wano waleke kubatitsighwa kwa ghamatsi?”
Apfo kalaghitsa wabatitsighwe kwa taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu. Kuya wamlomba Petiri akale nawo kwa ghamatsuwa chidogho.
